Metrics

AWP Aggregate winning percentage, record if you played every team every week
SOS Strength of schedule, relative difficulty of schedule based on opponents' power ranking score
PPG Points per game, total points for divided by number of games
MOV Average margin of victory, average of difference between your score and opponent's score
